Label.en: Have a good look at it... how does it make you feel?

Label.en: Me too! It's a terrible sad painting...

Label.en: It's by Paul Delaroche... painted around 1855, a year before his death!

Label.en: It's certainly a lot to take in... for me... I get really sad
